colorScheme.name: Color Scheme
colorScheme.description: Configure the colors used by the theme

fields.name: Primary Color
fields.description: The main color used for buttons, links, and other interactive elements.

fields.name: Secondary Color
fields.description: A secondary color used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

fields.name: Select Color
fields.description: Select used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

fields.name: Background Color
fields.description: Background color used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

fields.name: Background Color Secondary
fields.description: Background secondary color used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

fields.name: Background Color Tertiary
fields.description: Background Tertiary color used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

fields.name: Stroke Color
fields.description: Stroke color used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

font.name: Font
font.description: Configure the font used by the theme

fields.name: Font Name
fields.description: The name of the font used for text elements.

fields.name: Primary Text Color
fields.description: Primary text color used for text elements. Such as headings and labels.

fields.name: Secondary Text Color
fields.description: Secondary text color used for text elements. Such as paragraphs and captions.

fields.name: White Text Color
fields.description: White text color used for text elements. Such as paragraphs and captions.

fields.name: Placeholder Text Color
fields.description: Placeholder text color used for text elements. Such as input placeholders.

fields.name: Error Text Color
fields.description: Error text color used for text elements. Such as input placeholders, error messages.

fields.name: Warning Text Color
fields.description: Warning text color used for text elements. Such as input placeholders.

fields.name: Success Text Color
fields.description: Success text color used for text elements. Such as success messages.

buttons.description: Configure the buttons used by the theme

fields.description: Primary text color used for buttons.

fields.description: Primary hover background color used for buttons.

fields.description: Secondary text color used for buttons.

fields.name: Secondary Background Color
fields.description: Secondary background color used for buttons.

fields.name: Secondary Hover Background Color
fields.description: Secondary hover background color used for buttons.

fields.name: Stroke Color
fields.description: Stroke color used for borders, backgrounds, and other non-interactive elements.

fields.name: Primary Background Color
fields.description: Primary background color used for buttons.

fields.name: Tertiary text color
fields.description: Tertiary text color used for buttons.
